From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The two blasts pounded Megatron's already dented and charred chest, but
if he was in pain from them, he did not show it. He kept moving forward.
"I will show you the meaning of that title." he was now moved right in
front of Unitron, and reached for the hand with the laser pistol.
